name: buildable-dashboard
description: Business dashboard for Buildable Approvals Pty Ltd

scripts.dev: concurrently -n client,server -c blue,green "npm run dev -w client" "npm run dev -w server"
scripts.build: npm run build -w client && npm run build -w server
scripts.migrate: cd server && npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.migrate:deploy: cd server && npx prisma migrate deploy
